description: When creating an image I am getting a 200 response code, and per the spec it should be 202
title: OSAPI 1.1: create image response code is 200, should be 202

comments.content: When creating an image I am getting a 200 response code, and per the spec it should be 202
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~throughnothing

comments.content: The spec changed and this is no longer valid. New expected behavior is to return a 202 w/ a Location header (which is implemented correctly).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
